description: {wA lifelong competition between {YNi{yko{wl{ca{w and {YMa{ynd{wol{cus{w keeps
each shop owner always making sure his stock is the best.  The
clan did well when they set these two up on opposing sides
of the main hall.  {YMa{ynd{wol{cus{w is a skilled collector and hunter
of fine objects and he is determined not to be beaten by {YNi{yko{wl{ca{w.
Equal in quality and rarity are the objects found here, no one
leaves here feeling cheated, no matter what {YNi{yko{wl{ca{w says to his
patrons.{x
37362.name: {wT{Ch{we Second {YEm{ypo{wri{cu{8m{x

description: {wPerhaps the busiest room in the hall, {wT{Ch{we {YAn{yte{wro{co{8m{w is large and
spacious and filled in the center by a {GM{gako{Gu{w spring that serves to
aid and revive injured {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{w members.  The old {8witch{c-{8crone{w and
the stoic {RT{rri{Bp{bower{w Guard stand on different sides of the spring, each
reado to do their job of healing or assisting in personal growth through
practise, gains or trains.  As busy as {wT{Ch{we {YAn{yte{wro{co{8m{w is, it still holds
{wa feel of serenity and security that so embodies the spirit of T{Ch{we
{YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{x

description: {cVolume{w upon {cvolume{w fill the shelves that stretch from ceiling to
floor.  Everything is here, from glorious yarns spun by Bards to the

the {RG{rreat {BR{bealms{w the lands they are.  T{Ch{we {YAt{yhe{wna{ceu{8m{w is the pride and
joy of the clan, centuries have been spent collecting the volumes here
and centuries will continue to be spent in the pursuit of knowledge.
In every corner is a soft chair designed for hours of luxurious and
peaceful reading.  In all of the lands there is no finer library then
T{Ch{we {YAt{yhe{wna{ceu{8m{w of T{Ch{we {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{w.{x

for the clan and hungry friends.  On all sides are shops of some

seem to lure all that enter their way.  Although it it said

{wT{Ch{we {YPo{yrt{wi{cc{8o{w would greatly disagree.{x

many chairs for lectures and meetings, it is this age-old {ctable{w that

{wTo the east is the bar, the sound of laughter and music

description: {wAs you enter Rakasha's office the first thing you notice is a

partially covered by various maps and documents.  Various large
pillows lay scattered about the room perfect for curling up with one
of the books from the shelves.  {w

to violence, if they are called upon to fight they will be
in it to the end and to {Wwin{w.  The room is {8spartan{w in appearance
save for the carefully designed {Yd{yumm{Yy{w used by the members to
hone their skills.{x
37376.name: {wT{Ch{we {YPr{yac{wti{cs{8e {wR{Co{wom{x

description: {wAlways busy whether night or day, the {YTa{yve{wr{cn{w is a
treasured spot for members.  There are gaming tables around the
room, nothing like a {rcocktail{w and a game of chess to keep
the spirit happy.  {YDe{yni{wc{ca{w always seems to be here with
a smile and wink, quick to make sure the drinks are made just
right and no one leaves unhappy.  Not to mention she's pleasant
{won the eye, T{Ch{we {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{w know what they are doing.  The south
wall is filled by a large stone {rf{8i{Wr{re{8p{Wl{ra{8c{We{w for comfort in
bad weather.{x
37357.name: {wT{Ch{we {YTa{yve{wr{cn{x

description: {wTo enter into this space is to experience tranquility as
it was meant, almost as if the {gDr{yui{gds{w themselves had come
together to create a place of magical peace.  Words are
seldom spoken here, even the aging {8junkie{w keeps quiet.  He
has been here forever, offering his {Gherbs{w in exchange for
the solitude and safety of his life.  This is a good place.{x
37389.name: {wUnder The {gO{ya{gk {wTree{x

description: {wA wide-sweeping {YTe{yrr{wa{cc{8e{w that runs the length of the hall, it
has been said there is no more picturesque place in the lands to
watch a {Rs{ru{yns{re{Rt{w and get lost in a book.  {8Shaded{w in areas by tall
{gtrees{w that never whisper their secerets, there are luxurious chairs
and a few worn sofas scattered about offering just enough privacy
for those who wish to read undisturbed.  Much history of the lands
has been penned here as well, the scenery and atmosphere combining

{w(an invisible {Wwindow{w allows Westbridge Market Square to be watched){x
37373.name: {wT{Ch{we {YTe{yrr{wa{cc{8e{x

Laboratory is a unique feature to T{Ch{we {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{w.  Being privy to
the secrets of technology and energy grants them an advantage over

and {rtechnology{w are important here, there is much to be gathered and

37371.name: {wT{Ch{we {YLa{ybo{wra{cto{8ry{x

description: {wA spacious {ggreenhouse{w, the smells of the flora all seem

the world thanks to air travel and they are tended with care

37390.name: {wT{Ch{we {YCo{yns{wer{cva{8to{yry{x

description: {wThe first thing that strikes the visitor upon entering the
office of {CT{wa{Cw{wn{Cy{8 Judge{w is the strong smell of burning {gcatnip{w.
The office is inviting and cluttered, pictures of {RH{rathorn{Re{w in
various locations cover the desk along with papers and
notes and the neverending to do list.  She doesn't lock the
door, she prefers instead to leave the office open as a quiet
retreat for anyone who needs it.  Come on in, sit on the fat
{mcushions{w and share in a hit of the {Gnip{w.{x
37384.name: {YTa{ywn{wy{c'{8s{w O{Cf{wfice{x

{YAm{yph{wit{che{8at{yer{w.  {rDark carpeting{w covers the floor to ensure the sounds
of walking are muted, the walls are lined with bookcases and soft
chairs that are hard to resist.  The {ylighting{w is {8dim{w, just enough
to allow for reading without distraction.  The corridor is opulent

37380.name: {wT{Ch{we Main {YCo{yrr{wid{co{8r{x

beyond her years in knowledge.  Come in, look around.{x
37367.name: {wT{Ch{we {YAp{yot{whe{cca{8ry{x

description: {wCommissioned work crafted by skilled artisans, {wt{Ch{we {BWa{bte{wrf{Cal{Wl{w is a

{w(an invisible {Wwindow{w allows Westbridge Market Square to be watched){x

In every corner is a soft chair designed for hours of luxurious and

Gods and mortals hang side by side, eatch portrait showing intense

37379.name: {wT{Ch{we H{Ca{wll of {YGr{yea{wt M{cin{8ds{x

{wT{Ch{we {YPr{yac{wti{cs{8e {wR{Co{woms{w only emphasises T{Ch{we {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{w belief in

description: {wKnown as the Gazing Chamber, this large and welcoming area of

symbols of times long gone.  It is hard not to feel safe at and ease

{w(an invisible {Wwindow{w allows Westbridge Market Square to be watched){x
37350.name: {wThe Hall of T{Ch{we {YIl{ylu{wmi{cna{8ti{x
